lead_paragraph: Kevin Sack, who wrote this week’s cover story about the American life of Jacob Mach, one of the Lost Boys of Sudan, is a senior reporter at The Times.

headline.main: Behind the Cover Story: Kevin Sack on His Friendship with a Lost Boy
